sentences.sContent: She is bustling about all day long, serving the people.
sentences.sContent_eng: She is bustling about all day long, serving the people.
sentences.sCn: 她整天跑跑颠颠的给别人办事。

sentences.sContent: Bear and wild boars range through the forests all day long.
sentences.sContent_eng: Bear and wild boars range through the forests all day long.
sentences.sCn: 熊和野猪整天在森林中来回跑动。

sentences.sContent: She keeps after her boyfriend all day long and he can't bear it any more.
sentences.sContent_eng: She keeps after her boyfriend all day long and he can't bear it any more.
sentences.sCn: 她整天都在与她的男朋友争吵，他没法再忍受下去了。
